subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: Note that in Japanese [[shinjitai]], the bottom left handed stroke [[㇓]] of [[免]] is written as two separate components (𫩏+儿). This is encoded as a separate character [[晩]] (U+6669).

subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: This character is the [[kyūjitai]] form of {{ja-l|晩}} (U+6669) with one stroke reduction.
